CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Compared with the reported copolymer PzNDTTPD , 14 both PzNDTDTBT and PzNDTDTBO show broader absorption spectra and smaller bandgaps , which can be attributed to the stronger electron - accepting ability of the BT / BO unit in the copolymer , and this is beneficial to increase the light - harvesting capacity for higher short - circuit current density ( J sc ).

Let's think step by step.

1. Copolymer PzNDTTPD
2. PzNDTDTBT
3. PzNDTDTBO
4. BT / BO unit in the copolymer

These are the material names mentioned in the paragraph. They are all chemical compounds that make up different copolymers.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

1. Copolymer PzNDTTPD
2. PzNDTDTBT
3. PzNDTDTBO

These are the material names clearly referred to in the paragraph. The "BT / BO unit in the copolymer" is not a specific material name, but rather a general description of a component of the copolymer.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| Copolymer PzNDTTPD |
| PzNDTDTBT |
| PzNDTDTBO |

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Compared with the reported copolymer PzNDTTPD , 14 both PzNDTDTBT and PzNDTDTBO show broader absorption spectra and smaller bandgaps , which can be attributed to the stronger electron - accepting ability of the BT / BO unit in the copolymer , and this is beneficial to increase the light - harvesting capacity for higher short - circuit current density ( J sc ).

Let's think step by step.

1. "broader absorption spectra" - This is the first "Property Value" entity in the paragraph. A "property value" is a specific value or range of a property or attribute associated with an object or concept. In this case, "broader absorption spectra" is a property value of the copolymers PzNDTDTBT and PzNDTDTBO.
2. "smaller bandgaps" - This is the second "Property Value" entity in the paragraph. It is a property value of the copolymers PzNDTDTBT and PzNDTDTBO.
3. "the stronger electron - accepting ability of the BT / BO unit in the copolymer" - This is a property value of the BT/BO unit in the copolymers PzNDTDTBT and PzNDTDTBO.
4. "higher short - circuit current density ( J sc )" - This is the last "Property Value" entity in the paragraph. It is a property value of the copolymers PzNDTDTBT and PzNDTDTBO.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

1. Broader absorption spectra
2. Smaller bandgaps
3. The stronger electron-accepting ability of the BT/BO unit
4. Higher short-circuit current density (Jsc)

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| Broader absorption spectra |
| Smaller bandgaps |
| The stronger electron-accepting ability of the BT/BO unit |
| Higher short-circuit current density (Jsc) |
